channel.title: Wildy
channel.description: Hey! I made a server but my hometown is in wildy and everyone can attack each other at home. Can anyone please tell me how to put my home non-wildy?

item.title: Wildy
item.dc:creator: @vrac_defiled vrac defiled
item.description:
@vrac_defiled wrote:

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 27, 2008, 02:03:08 PM[/size][hr][quote=“xxx123xxx, post:2, topic:193452”]search in client.java[/quote]

… client.java is huge. Ty for trying to help me though, i appreciate it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 27, 2008, 02:04:05 PM[/size][hr][quote=“the predi, post:3, topic:193452”][quote author=xxx123xxx link=topic=257485.msg2139542#msg2139542 date=1206665883]
search in client.java
[/quote]
lol nice help

Ty

yeah u can make it a safezone, go into client.java and search for nonwild or safezone than u add your place from where to were with x coord and from where to were with y coords

like || (absX >= FIRST COORD && absX <= SECOND COORD && absY >= FIRST COORD && absY <= SECOND COORD)[/quote]

Read full topic
